summary: Replaces the combat music in Skyrim with tracks i thought would work as combat music in Skyrim for the Star Wars film series.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the combat music in Skyrim with tracks i thought would work as combat music in Skyrim for the Star Wars film series. Free to take suggestions of songs from the soundtrack. I plan to also change the exploration and dungeon music to ones that would fit each of those ScenariosÂ 
<br />
<br />Music includes:
<br />The Sith Spacecraft and the Droid Battle - Episode I
<br />Qui-Gon's Noble End - Episode I
<br />Jango's Escape - Episode II
<br />Battle of endor III - Episode VI
<br />The Falcon - Episode VII
<br />The Rathtars! - Episode VII
<br />March of the Resistance - Episode VII
<br />Scherzo for X-Wings - Episode VII
<br />Hope - Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
author: Kyalz
